rules_text:
{1}, {T}, Exile Tinkerbox: Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
{2}, {T}, Exile Tinkerbox: Create a Clue token, a Glyph token, and a Treasure token.
{3}, {T}, Exile Tinkerbox: Search your library for an artifact card not named Tinkerbox, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
